actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow self-employed individuals to deduct the full cost of their health insurance.
short_title: Small Business Owners' Health Insurance Deductibility Act

summary.text: Small Business Owners' Health Insurance Deductibility Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the deduction allowed for health insurance costs for self-employed individuals to 100 percent.

titles.title: Small Business Owners' Health Insurance Deductibility Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow self-employed individuals to deduct the full cost of their health insurance.
